about.details:
Cool Caps Industries is engaged in the business of manufacturing a range of plastic bottle caps and closures such as plastic soda bottle caps, plastic soft drink bottle caps, plastic mineral water bottle caps, and plastic juice bottle caps. It further manufactures embossed, debossed, and printed closures as per customers' specifications. The firm also manufactures face masks i.e., Mask on Plus N95 FFP 2 Mask, Mask on N95 FFP2 Mask, and N95 FFP2 Mask. The firm also engages in the trading of plastic granules such as Polypropylene Granule, High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE) Granules, Low-Density Polyethylene (LDPE), Linear Low-Density Polyethylene (LLDPE) Granules, etc.

Competitive strengths

  • The well-established manufacturing facility at Howrah, West Bengal, and Kotdwar, Uttarakhand.
  • Highly experienced management and workforce.
  • Cost leadership in procurement leads to cost-effective manufacturing.
  • A strong relationship with customers.

faqs.question: What is the Cool Caps IPO?
faqs.answer:
Cool Caps IPO is a SME IPO of 3060000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.63 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹38 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on March 10, 2022, and closes on March 15, 2022.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Cool Caps IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Cool Caps IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Cool Caps IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Cool Caps IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Cool Caps IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Cool Caps IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Cool Caps IPO opens on March 10, 2022 and closes on March 15, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Cool Caps IPO?
faqs.answer: Cool Caps IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,14,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Cool Caps IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Cool Caps IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Cool Caps IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Cool Caps IPO will be done on Monday, March 21, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, March 23, 2022. Check the Cool Caps IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Cool Caps IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Cool Caps IPO listing date is on Thursday, March 24, 2022.
